\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w younger|strong="G3501"\w* \w widows|strong="G5503"\w* \w refuse|strong="G3868"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w when|strong="G3752"\w* \w they|strong="G1161"\w* \w have|strong="G2309"\w* waxed wanton \w against|strong="G2691"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w they|strong="G1161"\w* \w desire|strong="G2309"\w* \w to|strong="G2309"\w* \w marry|strong="G1060"\w*;

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* withal \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w learn|strong="G3129"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \add to be \add*idle, \w going|strong="G2532"\w* \w about|strong="G4022"\w* \w from|strong="G2532"\w* \w house|strong="G3614"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w house|strong="G3614"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w only|strong="G3440"\w* idle, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w tattlers|strong="G5397"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w busybodies|strong="G4021"\w*, \w speaking|strong="G2980"\w* \w things|strong="G3588"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w ought|strong="G1163"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w*.

\w I|strong="G3767"\w* \w desire|strong="G1014"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w younger|strong="G3501"\w* \add widows \add*\w marry|strong="G1060"\w*, \w bear|strong="G5041"\w* \w children|strong="G5041"\w*, rule \w the|strong="G3588"\w* household, \w give|strong="G1325"\w* \w none|strong="G3367"\w* occasion \w to|strong="G1325"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* adversary \w for|strong="G3367"\w* reviling:
